title: Justin Bieber Wrote A Song With Ed Sheeran & It's All We Want To Hear Right Now
text: Justin Bieber wears a bright white beanie during his visit to the KISS FM studios in London, England on Friday afternoon (October 23). The 21-year-old singer has been promoting his upcoming album, Purpose, and brand new song, “Sorry”, around the UK. “We wrote a song together and basically it’s one of my favorites on the [...] »
